notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by the Canadian Institutes of Health Research, grant # MOP-106713 to K.M.C. and D.K. The SOMAscan platform was acquired and supported by funds provided by the Canadian Foundation for Innovation. P.J.S. received a scholarship from the Fonds de la Recherche en Santé du Québec (FRSQ). BSL3 work was performed at the Public Health Agency of Canada National Microbiology Laboratories in Winnipeg, Manitoba.
